0.9.name: wordpress/xmap
0.9.description:
Embed maps from the following domains into your WordPress blog:

  • http://www.bikemap.net
  • http://www.runmap.net
  • http://www.inlinemap.net
  • http://www.wandermap.net
  • http://www.mopedmap.net

You can do this using simple shortcodes, e.g.:

  • [bikemap route="1026736"]
  • [wandermap route="123456" extended="false"]

The following shortcodes are allowed:

  • [bikemap]
  • [wandermap]
  • [runmap]
  • [inlinemap]
  • [mopedmap]

The following attributes are allowed:

  • route: The route id (an integer)
  • extended: If route info like elevation, distance etc.
